meanings.definition: In a confusing or perplexing manner.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were so bewilderingly complex that I couldn't figure them out.
meanings.sent2: She looked around bewilderingly, trying to make sense of the unfamiliar surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The cat stared bewilderingly at the optical illusion, unsure if it was real or not.
meanings.sent4: The maze of hallways in the old castle twisted bewilderingly, like a never-ending puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky seemed to dance bewilderingly, creating a magical spectacle.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to become confused or disoriented.
meanings.sent1: The bewilderingly complex math problem left the students scratching their heads.
meanings.sent2: The maze was a bewilderingly confusing labyrinth of twists and turns.
meanings.sent3: The magician's bewilderingly quick sleight of hand left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were a bewilderingly chaotic mess during rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The sudden change in weather was bewilderingly unpredictable, catching everyone off guard.
